name: Dr. Floorman
description:
Controls:
WASD to move

Mouse to move mop

Dr. Floorman was once a very successful medical practitioner with a six figure salary. However, the years took a toll on him, and he began to grow tired of the medical field. One day, Dr. Floorman was watching his kids' high school basketball game when he noticed the janitor during halftime The janitor swept gracefully across the gymnasium floor, making every turn a work of art as he wielded his mighty broom. Dr. Floorman had finally found the cure to his stagnant medical career: He was going to become Janitor in Chief of this high school. So, Dr. Floorman quit his job at the hospital the very next day, and applied for a starting janitorial position at the school. As Dr. Floorman clocked into his first shift at the school, he tingled with the possibilities ahead of him. The only way to go from here is up.

Please note that this is a game jam game and is, at its current state, unpolished and unrefined. For example, there is no music. I intend to fix this at a later date.
